bug.author: gmrukwa
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Adding parallel coordinates plot for a project, the parameters are swapped with the metrics: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1897842/95587559-7a3efe00-0a42-11eb-8e56-f9c7b84c0a39.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To reproduce</denchmark-h>
Navigate to jobs list Click Visualize on the top of the table Click Add on the right hand side Select Parallel Open dimensions list
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Outputs of jobs should be listed as metrics and inputs of the jobs should be listed as params. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Polyaxon 1.1.9
